name: A.P. (DIR Series) Circular No.31
summary: This circular provides revised regulations for Foreign Portfolio Investors (FPI) investments in debt instruments. It introduces operational flexibility and transition paths for FPIs and custodians, including changes to minimum residual maturity requirements, concentration limits, and monitoring mechanisms. The circular modifies investment limits in government securities and corporate bonds, establishes new definitions for various security types, and implements online monitoring through CCIL.
